      void setNetworkReachabilityManager(NetworkReachabilityManager networkReachabilityManager)
      Override the default behavior and set your own NetworkReachabilityManager subclass, which allows you to completely control how to respond to network reachability changes in your app affects the replicators that are listening for change events.

        public java.io.File getFilesDir()
        Description copied from interface: Context
        The files dir. On Android implementation, simply proxies call to underlying Context

      • setNetworkReachabilityManager

        public void setNetworkReachabilityManager(NetworkReachabilityManager networkReachabilityManager)
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Override the default behavior and set your own NetworkReachabilityManager subclass, which allows you to completely control how to respond to network reachability changes in your app affects the replicators that are listening for change events.
        Specified by:
        setNetworkReachabilityManager in interface Context

      • getNetworkReachabilityManager

        public NetworkReachabilityManager getNetworkReachabilityManager()
        Description copied from interface: Context
        Replicators call this to get the NetworkReachabilityManager, and they register/unregister themselves to receive network reachability callbacks. If setNetworkReachabilityManager() was called prior to this, that instance will be used. Otherwise, the context will create a new default reachability manager and return that.
        Specified by:
        getNetworkReachabilityManager in interface Context

      • getWrappedContext

        public android.content.Context getWrappedContext()
